android.debug.build: cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest lintDebug -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.debug.windows.build: cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest lintDebug -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.release.windows.build: cd android && gradlew.bat assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ..

ios.debug.build: xcodebuild VALID_ARCHS="`uname -m`"  CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ -workspace ios/RNGoogleMobileAdsExample.xcworkspace -scheme RNGoogleMobileAdsExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES

ios.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild  CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ -workspace ios/RNGoogleMobileAdsExample.xcworkspace -scheme RNGoogleMobileAdsExample -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES
